Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Protein - truncation testing of the entire ATM cDNA detected 92 ( 66 % ) truncating mutations in 140 mutant alleles screened .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ATM gene mutations |

The paragraph is about the identification of mutations in the ATM gene using protein-truncation testing. Therefore, the disease entity is "ATM gene mutations".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ATM gene mutations |

The paragraph specifically mentions "mutations" in the context of the ATM gene, which is the disease entity. Other terms such as "protein-truncation testing", "entire ATM cDNA", and "140 mutant alleles screened" do not clearly refer to diseases.
